text: Anomoporia is a genus of fungi in the family Amylocorticiaceae. The genus was circumscribed by Czech mycologist Zdeněk Pouzar in 1966. ==Species list== *Anomoporia albolutescens *Anomoporia ambigua *Anomoporia bombycina *Anomoporia dumontii *Anomoporia flavissima *Anomoporia irpicoides *Anomoporia kamtschatica *Anomoporia myceliosa *Anomoporia neotropica *Anomoporia vesiculosa ==References== Category:Amylocorticiales Category:Agaricomycetes genera
title: Anomoporia
